subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Dusty Baker had a whole new look. Baker, 58, the new manager of the Reds, put on a bright red Cincinnati cap and a red-and-white jersey yesterday during his introduction as the next Reds manager. The color just did not fit. “This is my first red uniform in my whole life,” he said.
